statements: SELECT * FROM wrestling_promotions;
SELECT promotion_name, location FROM wrestling_promotions;
SELECT * FROM wrestling_promotions WHERE establishment_year > 2000;
SELECT founder_name, establishment_year FROM wrestling_promotions WHERE location = 'New York';
SELECT founder_name FROM wrestling_promotions ORDER BY establishment_year DESC;
SELECT * FROM wrestling_promotions WHERE establishment_year > 2000 ORDER BY promotion_name DESC LIMIT 5
SELECT promotion_name, founder_name FROM wrestling_promotions WHERE location = 'New York' AND establishment_year < 1990 ORDER BY establishment_year ASC
SELECT promotion_name, founder_name FROM wrestling_promotions WHERE establishment_year BETWEEN 1970 AND 2000 ORDER BY founder_name, establishment_year DESC LIMIT 10
SELECT * FROM wrestling_promotions WHERE location LIKE '%California%' OR founder_name LIKE '%John%' ORDER BY establishment_year ASC LIMIT 3
SELECT DISTINCT location FROM wrestling_promotions WHERE founder_name = 'Vince McMahon' ORDER BY location
SELECT * FROM Events;
SELECT event_name, event_date FROM Events WHERE location = 'New York';
SELECT champion_name, title FROM Champions ORDER BY champion_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM Champions WHERE years_active > 5 ORDER BY years_active DESC;
SELECT champion_name, years_active FROM Champions WHERE title LIKE '%Heavyweight%';
SELECT * FROM Events WHERE event_date > '2022-01-01'
SELECT champion_name, title FROM Champions WHERE years_active > 5 ORDER BY champion_name DESC
SELECT event_name, location FROM Events WHERE location LIKE '%New York%' ORDER BY event_date
SELECT champion_name, title, years_active FROM Champions WHERE years_active BETWEEN 1980 AND 2000
SELECT event_name, location FROM Events WHERE event_date < '2022-06-01' ORDER BY event_date ASC
SELECT * FROM wrestling_promotions;
SELECT promotion_name, location FROM wrestling_promotions;
SELECT * FROM wrestling_events ORDER BY event_date DESC;
SELECT event_name, event_date, promotion_name FROM wrestling_events JOIN wrestling_promotions ON wrestling_events.promotion_id = wrestling_promotions.promotion_id;
SELECT champion_name, title, promotion_name FROM wrestling_champions JOIN wrestling_promotions ON wrestling_champions.promotion_id = wrestling_promotions.promotion_id ORDER BY start_date;
SELECT * FROM wrestling_promotions;
SELECT promotion_name, location FROM wrestling_promotions WHERE location = 'New York';
SELECT champion_name, title FROM wrestling_champions ORDER BY start_date DESC;
SELECT event_name, event_date FROM wrestling_events WHERE event_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT promotion_name, champion_name FROM wrestling_promotions JOIN wrestling_champions ON wrestling_promotions.promotion_id = wrestling_champions.promotion_id;
SELECT * FROM wrestling_promotions;
SELECT promotion_name, country FROM wrestling_promotions WHERE country = 'USA';
SELECT champion_name, championship_title FROM wrestling_champions ORDER BY champion_id DESC;
SELECT event_name, event_date FROM wrestling_events WHERE event_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT storyline_name, storyline_description FROM wrestling_storylines WHERE promotion_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM wrestling_promotions;
SELECT promotion_name, country FROM wrestling_promotions WHERE country='USA';
SELECT event_name, event_date FROM wrestling_events ORDER BY event_date DESC;
SELECT champion_name, championship_title FROM wrestling_champions WHERE promotion_id=1;
SELECT storyline_name, storyline_description FROM wrestling_storylines WHERE promotion_id=2 ORDER BY storyline_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM events;
SELECT event_name, event_date FROM events;
SELECT champion_name, championship_title FROM champions;
SELECT storyline_title, storyline_description FROM storylines;
SELECT event_name, event_date, champion_name, championship_title FROM events JOIN champions ON events.event_id = champions.promotion_id;
SELECT * FROM events;
SELECT event_name, event_date FROM events WHERE event_id = 1;
SELECT event_name, storyline_title FROM events JOIN storylines ON events.event_id = storylines.storyline_id;
SELECT champion_name, championship_title FROM champions WHERE promotion_id = 1 ORDER BY champion_name ASC;
SELECT event_name, champion_name, result_description FROM events JOIN event_results ON events.event_id = event_results.event_id JOIN champions ON event_results.champion_id = champions.champion_id;
